items.sentence: Are you certain it was Tom you saw doing that?
I still enjoy doing that as much as I used to.
It would be better if you didn't say anything.
By the time we got there, it was already dark.
I think that Tom knows it was me who did that.
I've been coughing nonstop since this morning.
You have to be careful not to injure yourself.
What I'm going to do is none of your business.
Such ridiculous superstitions no longer exist.
The best way to help is to not get in the way.
Some people like coffee and others prefer tea.
The train left before they got to the station.
You should stay in the hospital for treatment.
Our walk was spoiled by the wind and the rain.
This rule can't be applied to every situation.
They killed a goat as a sacrifice to the gods.
It's become dark. Would you turn on the light?
When you say this, you sound just like father.
Brush your teeth properly before going to bed.
Tom has done something that he shouldn't have.
